content:
"Humanity's Last Exam" is a benchmark tool for AI intelligence. It contains 2700 expert level, multi modal questions that broadly cover over 100 subjects at the highest level of human academic knowledge. Over 1000 of the most highly qualified experts across 500 institutions and 50 countries contributed to prepare this test. At the time of writing, the highest an AI has scored on this test is 18.8%. It is expected that a single model will cross 50% by the end of 2025. 
Humans are quickly becoming obsolete.
